caption: Identity & Access Management
description: The Identity & Access Management (IAM) event is a generic event that defines a set of attributes available in the access control events. As a generic event, it could be used to log events that are not otherwise defined by the IAM category. Note: this event class should not be used a final solution. This generic event class should only be used temporarily until time can be spent mapping to a specific event class.
name: iam

http_request.description: Details about the underlying HTTP request.

http_response.description: Details about the underlying HTTP response.

src_endpoint.description: Details about the source of the IAM activity.
